Articles.Content:
Hey guys, two quick questions: are any of you aware of the mod that adds a small SRB - smaller than the Flea - called the RT-1 Mallet, and is there any mod that will give me aurora without having to rip out the guts of my visual mods I already have installed?  Currently I have EVE, Distant Object, Planet Shine and Stock Visual Enhancements.

I did have the Astronomers Visual Pack running until quite recently, but an accident with the install of KSP 1.7.2 meant I had to reinstall it, and even though I didn't upgrade to 1.7.3. I just couldn't get it to work right again.  This was a shame as it had aurora included.

Thanks everyone.
The RT1 is from restock+, and you should get that anyway, along with restock. SVE already has auroras.

Thanks for the reply KerbalKore.  I do have Restock but never got around to RT+, I'll have to take a look at that one.

Hmm... my SVE doesn't seem to have aurora, maybe there's a different version of that mod which I'm unaware of? I'll do a bit of investigating later when I have a little time to spare.

You could try Spectra.  That has a beautiful Aurora too.  Also, you may have left some parts of Astronomers behind which is mucking things up.  If you use CKAN I see no reason to not fully get rid of all the previous graphic mods and just reinstall what you want.  That would be the safest and best way to do it.  Just make sure you delete any extraneous stuff left behind.
